meanings.definition: Unable to be exceeded or surpassed.
meanings.sent1: The view from the mountaintop was unsurpassable, with no other peak higher in sight.
meanings.sent2: Her talent in painting was unsurpassable, making her the best artist in the class.
meanings.sent3: The race between the tortoise and the hare was unsurpassable, as the slow tortoise won in the end.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was unsurpassable, like a shining beacon of commitment.
meanings.sent5: The flavor of her homemade pie was unsurpassable, leaving everyone craving for more.

meanings.definition: The highest standard or level that can be achieved.
meanings.sent1: For him, reaching the top of the mountain was the unsurpassable goal of his life.
meanings.sent2: In the competition, she set the unsurpassable record for the fastest time.
meanings.sent3: The cake she baked was the unsurpassable highlight of the party, disappearing within minutes.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed was the unsurpassable force driving him forward.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset over the ocean was the unsurpassable moment of the vacation.
